name: HELPFUL
description:
HELPFUL is the world’s first plastic recycling and rewarding app. We are encouraging people to live a plastic-free life by making recycling and reusing easy and rewarding. We would like to play our part in reducing the 2.5 billion of cups and 7.5 billion water bottles, we are currently using every year in the UK. 

The app identifies the plastic and guides the user how to recycle it,  if one of our HELPFUL Bins is nearby, it directs them there to ensure it’s been recycled properly. 

HELPFUL is the world’s first plastic recycling and rewarding app, using the power of AI and smart bins technology to connect to existing public bin infrastructure to help people break the plastic habit by rewarding them for recycling, reusing and reducing single plastic usage. 

We are partnering with some of the UK’s leading brands, retailers and shopping centres to enable them to recycle their coffee cups and water bottles. 

The HELPFUL app is available for iPhones and Android smartphones.

jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
We are looking for a CTO to join HELPFUL
We're looking for an experienced CTO to lead the technology and software development of our app, platform and upcoming cryptocurrency ICO.  This is an opportunity to join an ambitious start up and be part of the management team. 
HELPFUL is a privately owned, London based ‘technology for good’ company. We are creating a new platform that changes the way we donate and address our worlds biggest problems. We give people the power to influence and act by taking small actions in their daily life. 
We are developing a visual discovery app, harnessing augmented reality and image recognition technologies to identify physical object, currently single use plastics.  The single use plastic become the currency to donate  and address big world problems. In the process, our users build their social good profile and earn money to either donate to good causes or use with selected vendors. 

We have big plans to change the way we all donate to charities and deal with the biggest issues in our society. We will be creating our own currency, a platform and charitable giving ecosystem to offer a complete solution to users, brands and charities.

Experience
You have worked with blockchain/cryptocurrencies extensively
You have taken part in a (successful) ICO
You have leadership/management experience
You are entrepreneurial and capable of owning the technology 
You have experience and enjoying working for a fast moving start up

Responsibilities
Oversee initial and ongoing product development
Manage all aspects of hardware and software requirements
Interface, recruit and manage subject matter experts in blockchain and cryptocurrency technical development
Serve as the outward-facing blockchain/cryptocurrency technical expert on the team


Required skills:
Comprehensive technical knowledge and experience in blockchain and cryptocurrency development
Great communicator and a team player
Ability to negotiate pricing, contracts and vendors
Excellent project management skills
Experience in mobile application development, fund-raising and e-commerce

If you like to know more, please get in touch with us.
